statements.select:
/* HydtMetrMap.SelectHydtMetrList 급수전계량기 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS A LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C ON A.MET_MOF = C.DTL_CD AND C.MST_CD = '250004' WHERE 1=1
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= #IST_YMD_FROM#
A.IST_YMD <= #IST_YMD_TO#
upper(A.HOM_NUM ) LIKE '%' || upper(#HOM_NUM#) || '%'
upper(A.HOM_NAM ) LIKE '%' || upper(#HOM_NAM# ) || '%'
A.HOM_HJD = #HOM_HJD#
A.MET_MOF = #MET_MOF#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.IST_YMD , A.HOM_NUM , A.HOM_NAM , A.HOM_HJD , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HOM_HJD) AS HOM_HJD_NAM , A.HOM_ADR , A.HOM_CNT , A.SBI_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250020' AND DTL_CD = A.SBI_CDE ) AS SBI_NAM , A.MET_DIP , A.MET_MOF, C.NM AS MOF_NAM , A.PRD_NUM , A.PIP_CDE , A.PIP_IDN , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.MET_NUM , CASE WHEN SDO_UTIL.VALIDATE_WKTGEOMETRY(SDO_UTIL.TO_WKTGEOMETRY(A.GEOM)) = 'TRUE' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS A LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C ON A.MET_MOF = C.DTL_CD AND C.MST_CD = '250004' WHERE 1=1
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= #IST_YMD_FROM#
A.IST_YMD <= #IST_YMD_TO#
upper(A.HOM_NUM ) LIKE '%' || upper(#HOM_NUM#) || '%'
upper(A.HOM_NAM ) LIKE '%' || upper(#HOM_NAM#) || '%'
A.HOM_HJD = #HOM_HJD#
A.MET_MOF = #MET_MOF#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* HydtMetrMap.SelectHydtMetrDtl 급수전계량기 상세정보*/
SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, M.* FROM ( SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , a.IST_YMD , A.HOM_NUM , A.HOM_NAM , A.HOM_HJD , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HOM_HJD) AS HOM_HJD_NAM , A.HOM_ADR , A.HOM_CNT , A.SBI_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250020' AND DTL_CD = A.SBI_CDE ) AS SBI_NAM , A.MET_DIP , A.MET_MOF , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250004' AND DTL_CD = A.MET_MOF ) AS MOF_NAM , A.PRD_NUM , A.PIP_CDE , A.PIP_IDN , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.MET_NUM , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN# ) M
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , IST_YMD , HOM_NUM , HOM_NAM , HOM_HJD , HOM_ADR , HOM_CNT , SBI_CDE , MET_DIP , MET_MOF , PRD_NUM , PIP_CDE , PIP_IDN , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , MET_NUM ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #IST_YMD# , #HOM_NUM# , #HOM_NAM# , #HOM_HJD# , #HOM_ADR# , #HOM_CNT# , #SBI_CDE# , #MET_DIP# , #MET_MOF# , #PRD_NUM# , #PIP_CDE# , #PIP_IDN# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #MET_NUM# )

/* 급수전계량기 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , HOM_NUM = #HOM_NUM# , HOM_NAM = #HOM_NAM# , HOM_HJD = #HOM_HJD# , HOM_ADR = #HOM_ADR# , HOM_CNT = #HOM_CNT# , SBI_CDE = #SBI_CDE# , MET_DIP = #MET_DIP# , MET_MOF = #MET_MOF# , PRD_NUM = #PRD_NUM# , PIP_CDE = #PIP_CDE# , PIP_IDN = #PIP_IDN# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , MET_NUM = #MET_NUM# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

MERGE INTO INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , HOM_NUM = #HOM_NUM# , HOM_NAM = #HOM_NAM# , HOM_HJD = #HOM_HJD# , HOM_ADR = #HOM_ADR# , HOM_CNT = #HOM_CNT# , SBI_CDE = #SBI_CDE# , MET_DIP = #MET_DIP# , MET_MOF = #MET_MOF# , PRD_NUM = #PRD_NUM# , PIP_CDE = #PIP_CDE# , PIP_IDN = #PIP_IDN# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , MET_NUM = #MET_NUM#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , IST_YMD , HOM_NUM , HOM_NAM , HOM_HJD , HOM_ADR , HOM_CNT , SBI_CDE , MET_DIP , MET_MOF , PRD_NUM , PIP_CDE , PIP_IDN , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , MET_NUM ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #IST_YMD# , #HOM_NUM# , #HOM_NAM# , #HOM_HJD# , #HOM_ADR# , #HOM_CNT# , #SBI_CDE# , #MET_DIP# , #MET_MOF# , #PRD_NUM# , #PIP_CDE# , #PIP_IDN# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #MET_NUM# )
/* 급수전계량기 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.select: SELECT A.FTR_CDE , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE, H.HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.IST_YMD , A.HOM_NUM , A.HOM_NAM , A.HOM_HJD, H2.HJD_NAM AS HOM_HJD_NAM , A.PIP_CDE , A.PIP_IDN FROM WTL_META_PS A LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA H ON H.HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA H2 ON H2.HJD_CDE = A.HOM_HJD WHERE 1=1 AND A.PIP_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND A.PIP_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

SELECT A.CHG_NUM , A.FTR_CDE ,(SELECT FTR_NAM FROM V_FTR_CDE F WHERE F.FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE ) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.META_SEQ , A.CHG_YMD , A.GCW_CDE, (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250041' AND DTL_CD = A.GCW_CDE) AS GCW_NAM , A.OME_NUM , A.OME_DIP , A.OME_CNT , A.OME_NAM , A.CHG_NAM , A.OME_MOF , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250004' AND DTL_CD = A.OME_MOF) AS OME_MOF_NAM
FROM WTT_META_HT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.FTR_CDE=#FTR_CDE# AND A.FTR_IDN=#FTR_IDN#
AND A.META_SEQ = #META_SEQ#
ORDER BY CHG_NUM DESC
SELECT nvl(max(META_SEQ),0)+1 as META_SEQ FROM WTT_META_HT
statements.update:
DELETE INFOFMS.WTT_META_HT WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
AND META_SEQ = #META_SEQ#

MERGE INTO WTT_META_HT USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN# AND META_SEQ = #META_SEQ#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CHG_YMD =#CHG_YMD# , GCW_CDE =#GCW_CDE# , OME_NUM =#OME_NUM# , OME_DIP =#OME_DIP# , OME_CNT =#OME_CNT# , OME_NAM =#OME_NAM# , CHG_NAM =#CHG_NAM# , OME_MOF =#OME_MOF# , ATT_USR =#ID# , ATT_TIM =TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyyMMddhh24miss')
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( CHG_NUM , FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , META_SEQ , CHG_YMD , GCW_CDE , OME_NUM , OME_DIP , OME_CNT , OME_NAM , CHG_NAM , OME_MOF , ATT_USR , ATT_TIM ) VALUES ( #CHG_NUM# , #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #META_SEQ# , #CHG_YMD# , #GCW_CDE# , #OME_NUM# , #OME_DIP# , #OME_CNT# , #OME_NAM# , #CHG_NAM# , #OME_MOF# , #ID# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') )
